Savage Archery.name: Savage Archery
Savage Archery.flavor: The vengeance that you instill in each shot tears into your foes and lowers their defenses.
Savage Archery.onHit: 1[W] + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to AC and Fortitude until the end of your next turn.

Cloud of Doom.name: Cloud of Doom
Cloud of Doom.flavor: You launch many arrows, causing a black cloud of them to fall on your foes and litter the ground with broken shafts and razorsharp barbs.
Cloud of Doom.onHit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier damage. If the target is flying, it falls prone.
Cloud of Doom.effect: The burst creates a zone of difficult terrain that lasts until the end of the encounter. Any creature takes 5 damage when it enters the zone on its turn. A creature can take this damage only once per turn.

Binding Aim.name: Binding Aim
Binding Aim.flavor: You pause long enough to whisper your enemyâ€™s name to the arrow you are about to fire.
Binding Aim.effect: You gain a +6 power bonus to the next ranged attack roll that you make before the start of your next turn.
